Organic Permutation (T92.1) - 8 generations
Organic Permutation is a game I started playing when I realized how often I use growth for compositional organization.
T92.1 starts with a single point that branches to a second. Each of these then branches again, to a total of four. In each successive generation, the number of points doubles, and the trick is to arrange them so that there is as much room for additional growth as possible.
T56.060728 July 28, 2006
digital vector file
